answers.answer: The center offers free medical consultations, access to some medical services, psychological support, and specific tests like ultrasound, ECG, blood pressure, and blood glucose checks.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the section under 'Health Promotion Center - free medical care for refugees from Ukraine'.

answers.answer: Every refugee from Ukraine is eligible to receive free medical consultations at the Health Promotion Center.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Appointments can be scheduled by calling 0747 278 486 or 0748 185 714. Calls can be made in Romanian, Russian, Ukrainian, or English.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the section under 'Appointments can be made by calling the following phone numbers'.

answers.answer: Consultations are offered by a pediatrician, cardiologist, diabetologist, ophthalmologist, and dentist.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the section under 'Consultations are offered by specialists of various profiles'.

answers.answer: The Red Cross provides translation help in English, Russian, or Ukrainian languages to facilitate better communication with doctors.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the section under 'Red Cross offers help with translation'.

answers.answer: A Health Promotion Center for refugees is located in Bucharest. The specific street address is not provided in the content.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The center's operating hours are Monday to Friday from 10:00 to 18:00.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the section under 'Working hours'.

answers.answer: The Health Promotion Center offers psychological support for refugees of any age.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Refugees can access an ultrasound according to a doctor's recommendation, an ECG, blood pressure measurement, and checks for blood glucose levels.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the section under 'It is possible to do an ultrasound according to the doctor's recommendation'.

answers.answer: Red Cross Romania opened the Health Promotion Center with the support of the French Red Cross.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The provided content does not explain why a health promotion center is important for the well-being of refugees.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.
